[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don't control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
When this battle is defeated, at the beginning of the next end step, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.
